thread.section_title: W New York - Union Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fab Hotel
thread.title_full: Fab Hotel - Review of W New York - Union Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mattpgab
title: Fab Hotel
text: Fab hotel situated in arguably the best neighborhood in NYC. Well run hotel situated right in the heart of Union Square near great shopping and restaurants. Quiet rooms with high ceilings and modern amenities. Our room on the 14th floor faced south with clear views of the freedom tower and lower Manhattan. Fresh from a recent facade facelift and living room refresh, this hotel is hard to beat. Plus, the GM is a peach. We happened to run into him at the hotel bar- the Irvington, a Gerber run restaurant and bar. We'll be back, Bill!
